analysis: The documents in this cluster primarily concern the modification, revocation, or establishment of land reservations and withdrawals across various states, often involving power sites, water reserves, coal lands, and other public uses. They specify land descriptions using the Public Land Survey System and cite the authority of the President under the Act of June 25, 1910, as amended. The documents reflect actions taken to manage and allocate public lands for different purposes, including resource development, conservation, and military use.
title: Adjustments to Land Use Designations
